brief: This is a simple reverb effect.

methods.name: damp()
methods.desc: Changes the damping factor of the reverb effect.

methods.name: room()
methods.desc: Change the room size of the reverb effect.

methods.name: set()
methods.desc: Set multiple parameters of the reverb.

methods.name: wet()
methods.desc: Change the wet/dry ratio of the reverb.

description: This is a simple reverb effect.
name: Reverb
